alert.note: Alert for Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 24 at 1:53AM CDT until May 26 at 9:24PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River near Ripley affecting Payne County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late this morning. && ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Cimarron River near Ripley. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Places along the Cimarron River valley in Payne County are briefly flooded to depths of about a foot. Agricultural lands and oil wells located near the river banks are inundated or cut off by water in side channels. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
